title: Lovestruck
description: Rock star. Billionaire. Goddess.She’s all of the above, but only one of those things is the key to mending her broken heart.When infidelity shatters her perfect L.A. life, Eden Rose Masterson heads home for some small-town recuperation. Only fate has other plans. Instead of nursing her wounded pride, she’s bombarded with the discovery that she’s a Goddess of Love and that Cupid is her new BFF.Reconnecting with multiple men from her past, she discovers just what she’s been missing. Who knew rebounding could be so much fun? But being a goddess has a dark side, and she soon learns that not all men are willing to share. Lovestruck is the first book in the Rock Goddess Reverse Harem series. One-click your copy of this high-heat low-fantasy read now.
author: Romy Lockhart
